H0.text: Pearl is composed of minute crystals of which compound. Silicon Dioxide (SiO2)

H1.text: Pearl is composed of minute crystals of which compound. Magnesium Carbonate (MgCO3)

H2.text: Pearl is composed of minute crystals of which compound. Aluminum Oxide (Al2O3)

H3.text: Pearl is composed of minute crystals of which compound. Caco3

A4.text: Nacre is composed of hexagonal platelets, called tablets, of aragonite (a form of calcium carbonate) 10–20 μm wide and 0.5 μm thick arranged in continuous parallel lamina.

A5.text: a pearl is composed of calcium carbonate (mainly aragonite or a mixture of aragonite and calcite) in minute crystalline form

A6.text: the mollusk's mantle deposits layers of calcium carbonate (CaCO3) in the form of the mineral aragonite or a mixture of aragonite and calcite
